sk1.name: Wild Axes
sk1.desc: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once.

sk2.name: Call of the Wild
sk2.desc: Beastmaster calls a watchful Hawk. Level 1: Summons a Scout Hawk.Level 2: Summons a Scout Hawk.Level 3: Summons a Greater Hawk.Level 4: Summons a Greater Hawk.

sk3.name: Call of the Wild
sk3.desc: Beastmaster calls a powerful Boar. Level 1: Not Available./ Level 2: Summons a Lesser Boar/ Level 3: Summons a Lesser Boar/ Level 4: Summons a Greater Boar.

sk4.name: Inner Beast
sk4.desc: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

sk5.name: Primal Roar
sk5.desc: A deafening roar that deals damage and stuns the target enemy unit, while opening a path between Beastmaster and his prey. Nearby enemies also take damage and have their movement speed and attack rate reduced.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
